extralanguagelink-param-class: Localised name for the "class=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word
extralanguagelink-param-hreflang: Localised name for the "hreflang=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word
extralanguagelink-param-lang: Localised name for the "lang=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word
extralanguagelink-param-style: Localised name for the "style=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word
extralanguagelink-param-title: Localised name for the "title=" parameter for the {{extralanguagelink}} magic word
extralanguagelink-badinterwiki: An error message. $1 represents an interwiki prefix (e.g. w or commons), which should be followed by a colon (:).
extralanguagelink-badtitle: An error message. $1 is some user-supplied piece of text, supposed to be a page title or link.
